00033 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00034 
00035 #define Usb_mouse_up()                  (usb_mouse_report[2]-=MOUSE_SPEED)
00036 #define Usb_mouse_down()                (usb_mouse_report[2]+=MOUSE_SPEED)
00037 #define Usb_mouse_left()                (usb_mouse_report[1]-=MOUSE_SPEED)
00038 #define Usb_mouse_right()               (usb_mouse_report[1]+=MOUSE_SPEED)
00039 #define Usb_mouse_click_left()          (usb_mouse_report[0] |= 0x01)
00040 #define Usb_mouse_click_right()         (usb_mouse_report[0] |= 0x02)
00041 #define Usb_mouse_click_middle()        (usb_mouse_report[0] |= 0x04)
00042 #define Usb_mouse_release_left()        (usb_mouse_report[0] &= ~0x01)
00043 #define Usb_mouse_release_right()       (usb_mouse_report[0] &= ~0x02)
00044 #define Usb_mouse_release_middle()      (usb_mouse_report[0] &= ~0x04)
00045 #define Usb_mouse_scroll_up()           (usb_mouse_report[3]++)
00046 #define Usb_mouse_scroll_down()         (usb_mouse_report[3]--)
00047 #define Usb_mouse_report_reset()        (usb_mouse_report[0]=0,usb_mouse_report[1]=0,usb_mouse_report[2]=0,usb_mouse_report[3]=0)
00048 
00049 #define Is_mouse_left_event()         Is_joy_left()
00050 #define Is_mouse_right_event()        Is_joy_right()
00051 #define Is_mouse_up_event()           Is_joy_up()
00052 #define Is_mouse_down_event()         Is_joy_down()
00053 #define Is_mouse_click_left_event()   Is_hwb()
00054 #define Is_mouse_release_left_event() !Is_hwb()

00065 U8 report_ready;
00066 U8 usb_mouse_report[4];
00067 U16 wheel;
00068 volatile U8 cpt_sof;
00069 extern  U8   usb_configuration_nb;

00071 
00083 void mouse_task_init(void)
00084 {
00085    Joy_init();
00086    Hwb_button_init();
00087    init_adc();
00088    Usb_mouse_report_reset();
00089    report_ready=TRUE;
00090    wheel=Get_adc_pot_val();
00091    cpt_sof=0;
00092    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00093 }

00106 void mouse_task(void)
00107 {
00108    if(Is_device_enumerated() && is_usb_mouse_event() && !Is_usb_report_ready())
00109    {
00110       report_ready=TRUE;
00111    }
00112 
00113    if (Is_device_enumerated() && Is_usb_report_ready())
00114    {
00115       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MOUSE_IN);
00116       if (Is_usb_write_enabled())
00117       {
00118          Usb_set_report_not_ready();
00119          Usb_write_byte(usb_mouse_report[0]);
00120          Usb_write_byte(usb_mouse_report[1]);
00121          Usb_write_byte(usb_mouse_report[2]);
00122          Usb_write_byte(usb_mouse_report[3]);
00123          Usb_ack_in_ready();
00124       }
00125    }
00126 }
00127 
00136 bit is_usb_mouse_event(void)
00137 {
00138    static bit usb_mouse_event_stored;
00139    U16 new_wheel;
00140 
00141 #if (USB_LOW_SPEED_DEVICE==DISABLE)
00142    if(cpt_sof<NB_IDLE_POLLING_SOF) return FALSE;
00143    cpt_sof=0;
00144 #endif
00145 
00146    Usb_mouse_report_reset();
00147 
00148    new_wheel=Get_adc_pot_val();
00149    if(new_wheel>680)
00150    {
00151       Usb_mouse_scroll_down();
00152       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00153    }
00154    if(new_wheel<340)
00155    {
00156       Usb_mouse_scroll_up();
00157       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00158    }
00159    wheel=new_wheel;
00160 
00161    if(Is_mouse_click_left_event())
00162    {
00163       Usb_mouse_click_left();
00164       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00165    }
00166 
00167    if (Is_mouse_left_event())
00168    {
00169       Usb_mouse_left();
00170       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00171    }
00172 
00173    if (Is_mouse_right_event())
00174    {
00175       Usb_mouse_right();
00176       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00177    }
00178 
00179    if (Is_mouse_down_event())
00180    {
00181       Usb_mouse_down();
00182       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00183    }
00184 
00185    if (Is_mouse_up_event())
00186    {
00187       Usb_mouse_up();
00188       usb_mouse_event_stored = 1;
00189    }
00190 
00191    if (usb_mouse_event_stored == 1)
00192    {
00193       usb_mouse_event_stored = 0;
00194       return TRUE;
00195    }
00196    else {return FALSE;}
00197 
00198 }

00200 
00210 void sof_action()
00211 {
00212    cpt_sof++;
00213 }

00225 void vbus_off_action(void)
00226 {
00227    Usb_detach();
00228 }
